_header: He that is the great profound sapience
_description: The Hours of the Cross — 5 stanzas, mainly in rhyme royal

CULAdd4120.First Lines:
He that ys the great profounde sapienceAnd dyuyne truethe of the
                    father on hye…
CULAdd4120.Last Lines:
…Great merueylous thynges to beholde and heareAnd yet a kynght
                    perced hys hert wiht a speare
